results.name: Oware! The National Game of Africa

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4710MQ @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4710MQ @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: VR support requirements may exceed minimum requirements
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: VR support requires Oculus Rift or HTC Vive. May work with other unsupported OpenVR capable headsets.
